message_1: Find the solution of the equation 3^x ≡ 7 (mod 23), where x is a positive integer less than 23.
message_2:
To solve the equation 3^x ≡ 7 (mod 23), we can use the brute force method by calculating the powers of 3 modulo 23 until we find the one that is congruent to 7. 

1. 3^1 ≡ 3 (mod 23)
2. 3^2 ≡ 9 (mod 23)
3. 3^3 ≡ 27 ≡ 4 (mod 23)
4. 3^4 ≡ 81 ≡ 12 (mod 23)
5. 3^5 ≡ 243 ≡ 13 (mod 23)
6. 3^6 ≡ 729 ≡ 6 (mod 23)
7. 3^7 ≡ 2187 ≡ 18 (mod 23)
8. 3^8 ≡ 6561 ≡ 2 (mod 23)
9. 3^9 ≡ 19683 ≡ 8 (mod 23)
10. 3^10 ≡ 59049 ≡ 24 ≡ 1 (mod 23)
11. 3^11 ≡ 3 (mod 23) (cycle repeats)

We can see that none of the powers of 3 modulo 23 are congruent to 7. Therefore, there is no positive integer x less than 23 that satisfies the equation 3^x ≡ 7 (mod 23).
